price: 102. ¡Oh, creyentes!, teman a Al-lah como es debido y mueran sometidos a Él como verdaderos musulmanes.
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ ٱتَّقُواْ ٱللَّهَ حَقَّ تُقَاتِهِۦ وَلَا تَمُوتُنَّ إِلَّا وَأَنتُم مُّسۡلِمُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū ittaqū al-laha ḥaqqa tuqātihi walā tamūtunna illā wa-antum mus'limūna
